parameters: If you're looking for supplies, the General Store's just down south.
Wait, though... I bet you're lookin' to fuck! Yeah, you seem like those kinda girls... Heh.
Well, just head on down the road to Verona's! I promise you'll love 'it! Hee hee~!
But that's part of why we like it here.
I heard people sayin' they saw an Orc 'round here...
Well, if she is, I reckon we'd better stay on our toes... You never know when... y'know...
Didja see that "Soulgem" store openin' over there?!
I get a creepy feelin' just thinkin' about it...!
Y'all ain't from around here, huh?

\!
I bet you ain't even seen a spell pistol before, huh?
Well, just 'bout everybody 'round here uses one.

\!
It's a weapon that shoots magic energy at high speeds - damn good damage, too!
Some girls - we call 'em Gunslingers - can use Spirit Bullets to create more magical effects than just damage.
'Course, the only Gunslingers you'll find 'round here now are bandits...
Used to be West Beach Outpost had a whole bunch of Gunslingers to protect us, with Annie makin' bullets for all of 'em.
But then Annie went on her rampage an' the Gunslingers all turned bad after that...
Hah hah hah hah~!! It's incredible!!
This place is JUST like how it used to be on the plains!

\!
\}Well, we didn't have any of these weird "pistols", but still...
I guess the old rumors about a caravan that managed to go through Woodrot Forest to the other side were true after all!
Looks like they maintained their distance from the rest of the continent enough that they stayed about the same since then...
This is great!! It's like I'm back home!
This is great!! It's like I'm back home!

\!
I am Maritus, Lady Lyra's butler, as you may recall.
Lady Lyra is ready for you now.
Sweet mercy me, they sold my shop?
Sweet mercy me, the place is a wreck...
I'm awful sorry 'bout what I did out there, but I swear by the Goddess I was under them dirty bandits' spell.
But now... Well, I got me some new problems...
Turns out they made me make a mess of the town before they took me away.

\!
Then they made me make Spell Bullets for 'em...
But some folk in town... They don't believe it.

\!
They think I just got whipped up in an Orc frenzy and I'm blamin' the bandits for my... "nature."
Listen, y'all... I came here from Tabnath a while ago.

\!
My real name's An'Ka, but folks here call me Annie.
I thought that meant I fit in here...
What I'm saying is... \|Y'all need another helper?

\!
I'm a good shot and I can make Spell Bullets better'n anyone, I guarantee it!
Yep... Yep, I figured that's what you'd say...
...And here I thought I fit in here...
What now? \!Y'all come back to bully me some more?
You... You mean it? \|You think I was being controlled?
Listen, y'all... I came here from Tabnath a while ago.

\!
My real name's An'Ka, but folks here call me Annie.
I thought that meant I fit in here...
What I'm saying is... \|Y'all need another helper?

\!
I'm a good shot and I can make Spell Bullets better'n anyone, I guarantee it!
